OVERVIEW OF COCOHITECH JSC VIETNAM

CocoHitech JSC is a Manufacture and Export centre of Agricultural products of Vietnam. Located in Ben Tre province, known as the land of coconut in Vietnam, our company CocoHitech is specialized in exporting coconut related products such as Coconut Fiber, Coir Mat, Coir rope, Coconut husk,…etc. Besides, we also diversified our product line by adding a variety of other different agricultural products such as Areca Leaf Plates, Braided Water Hyacinth Fiber, Dried Noni Fruit, and many tropical fruits.

COCOHITECH JSC’S CORE VALUE

What makes up the most value of CocoHitech lies in our customers. We view customer satisfaction as the most exact measure of our company’s true value and the final goal that our business aims at. That is the reason why we have been trying our best every single day to improve product quality to satisfy our existing and future customers. Above quantity and price, quality is viewed as the keyword that differentiates CocoHitech with other competitors. We work for quality, build up prestige by the quality, and develop our shelves based on quality. Quality is also the firm base for our company to build up close relationships with our partners throughout 4 years of operation.

COCOHITECH’S MISSION

CocoHitech seeks to bring wholesalers oversea unique, high-quality agricultural products of Vietnam. We strive to grow our business with honesty and the effort to provide better products and better solutions for our customers’ problems. We also make a contribution to a more sustainable life by providing a variety of environmental-friendly materials made from the abundant coconut resource of Vietnam.

Coco Hitech JSC là công ty sản xuất các sản phẩm làm từ dừa tại Việt Nam. Chúng tôi cung cấp hàng loạt các sản phẩm làm từ trái dừa như xơ dừa đóng kiện, thảm xơ dừa, dây xơ dừa, vỏ dừa, mụn dừa, dừa non, v.v.
